name: SKUniformType
desc: An enumerated type to identify the type of a uniform object.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Indicates that the uniform variable does not currently hold any data. A uniform object has this type until the first time its value is set.

items.name: case float
items.desc: Indicates that the uniform variable holds a 32-bit floating-point value.

items.name: case floatVector2
items.desc: Indicates that the uniform variable holds a vector of two 32-bit floating-point values.

items.name: case floatVector3
items.desc: Indicates that the uniform variable holds a vector of three 32-bit floating-point values.

items.name: case floatVector4
items.desc: Indicates that the uniform variable holds a vector of four 32-bit floating-point values.

items.name: case floatMatrix2
items.desc: Indicates that the uniform variable holds a 2 x 2 matrix of four 32-bit floating-point values.

items.name: case floatMatrix3
items.desc: Indicates that the uniform variable holds a 3 x 3 matrix of four 32-bit floating-point values.

items.name: case floatMatrix4
items.desc: Indicates that the uniform variable holds a 3 x 3 matrix of four 32-bit floating-point values.

items.name: case texture
items.desc: Indicates that the uniform variable holds a reference to a SpriteKit texture.
